resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.

At ibato, we believe that through modern technology we can lessen the loads and stress of people who undergo hemodialysis, which we have come up with the idea of classifying their dietary restriction in vegetable and fruits due to that their kidneys cannot get rid of waste products and fluids from their blood. 
At first, we thought about how we will be able to implement it, especially on classifying the dietary restriction of vegetables and fruits. As we do research we found out about Artificial Intelligence is which has helped us in finding the answer to our problem.
 
We dedicate this application to our thesis adviser Ms. Angeline Chrisette Olegario that has helped and motivate us to accomplish this application.

The information provided by our application is for general information purposes only.
